description:
When learning some new technology it usually seems to sink in better if
you use a practical example. In this quick demo I show how I took video
game data and used it to learn how to use Python Pandas library in a
Jupyter Notebook by modeling the StalkMarket prices of turnips on
someone's ACNH Island.

| More information for after viewing the presentation:
| https://snacktraces.com/pyohio21/
title: Learn Jupyter Notebook Python by Modeling Your Game Data
